title: GO_vertices
description: A entry for vertices in the Gene Ontology (GO) hierarchy

id.description: The unique id of the current term.

name.description: The term name. Any term may have only one name defined.

alt_id.description: Defines an alternate id for this term. A term may have any number of alternate ids.

def.description: The definition of the current term.
examples: 'The directed movement of a ribosomal subunit from the nucleus into the cytoplasm.' [GOC:ai]
This term was made obsolete because it refers to a class of gene products and a biological process rather than a molecular function.

subset.description: This tag indicates a term subset to which this term belongs.

synonym.description: This tag gives a synonym for this term, some xrefs to describe the origins of the synonym, and may indicate a synonym category or scope information.

xref.description: A dbxref that describes an analagous term in another vocabulary

is_a.description: This tag describes a subclassing relationship between one term and another. The value is the id of the term of which this term is a subclass.
examples: GO:0000054 ! ribosomal subunit export from nucleus

intersection_of.description: This tag indicates that this term is equivalent to the intersection of several other terms.

disjoint_from.description: This tag indicates that a term is disjoint from another, meaning that the two terms have no instances or subclasses in common.

relationship.description: This tag describes a typed relationship between this term and another term. The value of this tag should be the relationship type id, and then the id of the target term.

is_obsolete.description: Whether or not this term is obsolete.

replaced_by.description: Gives a term which replaces an obsolete term.

consider.description: Gives a term which may be an appropriate substitute for an obsolete term, but needs to be looked at carefully by a human expert before the replacement is done.

created_by.description: Optional tag added by OBO-Edit to indicate the creator of the term

creation_date.description: Optional tag added by OBO-Edit to indicate the creation time and date of the term
